name: Hedge Fund Research Inc. (HFR) API
description: Hedge Fund Research (HFR) is the established global leader in indexation, analysis and research of the global hedge fund industry. HFR provides comprehensive data on hedge fund performance, indices, and industry benchmarks through both database subscriptions and index data services.

endpoints.description: Access to HFRI index performance data across all strategies
endpoints.response_format: JSON with index performance metrics and metadata

endpoints.description: Access to hedge fund database with performance and characteristics data
endpoints.response_format: JSON with fund profiles and performance data

endpoints.description: Access to index constituent fund information
endpoints.response_format: JSON with constituent fund details and weights

documentation_sections.authentication: Contact HFR at +1-312-658-0955 for API credentials
documentation_sections.sdks_libraries: Excel, Python, and third-party vendor integrations available

data_coverage.update_frequency: Monthly for indices, Daily for HFRX

limitations: Commercial license required for API access
Subscription-based pricing model
Limited free access to index data
Authentication required for database access

name: Preqin API
category: Private Capital and Alternative Investment Data
description: Preqin provides comprehensive data and analytics on private capital markets including private equity, venture capital, hedge funds, real estate, and infrastructure. The Preqin Data Feeds API provides access to the industry's most comprehensive private capital and hedge fund datasets.

endpoints.description: Produces file containing Preqin Company Current Investor data
endpoints.response_format: CSV with company and investor information

endpoints.description: Produces file containing Preqin Company Deal Buyout data
endpoints.response_format: CSV with deal and transaction information

endpoints.description: Access to private capital fund performance data and benchmarks
endpoints.response_format: CSV with performance metrics and quartile rankings

documentation_sections.sdks_libraries: RESTful API supports multiple programming languages

pricing.contact_sales: Contact Preqin sales team for pricing

data_coverage.update_frequency: Daily and monthly depending on dataset

compliance_security.data_governance: Rigorous data collection and validation methods

limitations: Enterprise-only pricing
Authentication required for all endpoints
Limited free trial access
Custom pricing requires sales contact

name: PitchBook API
description: PitchBook provides comprehensive data on private and public capital markets including venture capital, private equity, and M&A transactions. The PitchBook API v2 allows direct, real-time access to their expansive database of companies, deals, people, investors, funds, and service providers.

endpoints.description: Search and retrieve private company information and profiles
endpoints.response_format: JSON with company profiles and business data

endpoints.description: Access investment deal and transaction data
endpoints.response_format: JSON with deal details and transaction information

endpoints.description: Retrieve investor and fund information
endpoints.response_format: JSON with investor profiles and fund data

endpoints.description: Access fund performance and characteristics data
endpoints.response_format: JSON with fund details and performance metrics

documentation_sections.sdks_libraries: RESTful API compatible with standard HTTP clients

tiers.name: API Credits
features: Each endpoint has defined credit cost

pricing.contact_sales: Contact PitchBook account manager for API credits and pricing

data_coverage.coverage_stats: 5+ million private companies, 560k+ investors, 2.6+ million deals

limitations: Credit-based pricing can be expensive for high usage
Requires separate API contract from platform access
Limited free sandbox access
Must estimate usage for credit purchasing

name: CB Insights API
description: CB Insights provides comprehensive market intelligence on technology companies, startups, and innovation trends. The CB Insights API enables programmatic access to organizations, deals, financial transactions, business relationships, and AI-generated market insights.

endpoints.description: Search and retrieve technology company profiles and firmographics
endpoints.response_format: JSON with company profiles and business intelligence data

endpoints.description: Access funding deals, M&A transactions, and financial data
endpoints.response_format: JSON with deal details and AI-generated insights

endpoints.description: Retrieve investor profiles and investment activity
endpoints.response_format: JSON with investor data and portfolio information

endpoints.description: Access technology market profiles and AI-generated analysis
endpoints.response_format: JSON with market analysis and expert research

documentation_sections.sdks_libraries: RESTful API with standard HTTP client support

data_coverage.historical_data: Comprehensive historical startup and deal data
data_coverage.coverage_stats: 10+ million companies, 1+ billion data points, 1,500+ market profiles

limitations: API v1 is in maintenance mode
Enterprise pricing model
Limited free access
Requires subscription for full functionality

name: AngelList API
description: AngelList provides access to startup and investor data through multiple APIs including the Relay API for portfolio management and a GraphQL API for transaction data. The platform connects startups with investors and provides comprehensive data on the startup ecosystem.

endpoints.description: Fetch list of companies in portfolio with associated funds
endpoints.response_format: JSON with company details and fund associations

endpoints.description: Get all updates for specific company by ID
endpoints.response_format: JSON with company updates and business metrics

endpoints.description: GraphQL endpoint for transaction data and investment management
endpoints.response_format: GraphQL JSON response with transaction details

documentation_sections.code_examples: Available in documentation with curl examples

pricing.contact_sales: Submit request to AngelList team with organization details

compliance_security.data_governance: Secure portfolio and transaction data management

limitations: Limited public API endpoints
Requires approval for API access
Rate limiting of 1000 requests per hour historically
Some endpoints require special authentication approval
No longer publicly available startup directory API

name: Crunchbase API
description: Company and startup database providing comprehensive information on organizations, funding rounds, acquisitions, and market intelligence

endpoints.description: Retrieve information for a specific organization entity
endpoints.response_format: JSON with organization information and metadata

endpoints.description: Search for organizations with flexible filtering criteria
endpoints.response_format: JSON with results array and metadata

endpoints.description: Search for funding rounds with filtering by amount, date, investors
endpoints.response_format: JSON with funding round information and metadata

endpoints.description: Search for people and their professional connections

use_cases: Investment deal sourcing and due diligence

name: IEX Cloud API
description: IEX Cloud was a comprehensive financial data platform that provided REST APIs for market data. The service was officially retired on August 31, 2024

technical_info.authentication_details: API token passed as URL parameter ?token=YOUR_TOKEN

endpoints.description: Real-time stock quote data
endpoints.response_format: JSON with quote data

endpoints.description: Historical price data for various time ranges
endpoints.response_format: JSON array with historical data

endpoints.description: Market index data
endpoints.response_format: JSON with market data

notes: IEX Cloud shut down to allow parent company IEX to refocus on core exchange operations. Users have migrated to alternatives like Alpha Vantage and Polygon.io

description: Comprehensive financial data API providing end-of-day, real-time, and fundamental data for 150,000+ tickers including stocks, ETFs, funds, and currencies worldwide

endpoints.description: End-of-day historical stock price data with date range filtering

endpoints.description: Live (delayed) stock prices with real-time data
endpoints.response_format: JSON with current price, change, volume, timestamp

endpoints.description: Fundamental data for stocks, ETFs, mutual funds, and indices
endpoints.response_format: JSON with comprehensive fundamental data including financials, ratios, highlights

endpoints.description: Bulk download of entire exchange data for a particular day

endpoints.description: Search API to find stock symbols using company names or partial symbols
endpoints.response_format: JSON array with matching symbols and company information
